page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - cluster027 incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on cluster027 has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 29/03/2025 01:31 UTC End time : 29/03/2025 02:21 UTC Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software malfunction on the load balancer. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Statistics incident notification
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting statistics accessibility on our Web Hosting offer for all clusters in GRA. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 01/01/2025 00:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : All Clusters in GRA. Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their web hostings statistics in GRA. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .hr domains
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Domains offer. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 24/03/2025 10:00 UTC Impacted Services : .hr domains are not currently available for registration or transfer. Customers Impact : Customer with a .hr domains name are unable to perform some tasks. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a maintenance of one of our provider. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologise for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
